colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(LHA CHEN TSANGS PA ZHI DRAG GI RJES GNANG GI SNGON CHAD MA DAR BA 'DI PHYIS SU, ^ SKYABS MGON RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I MNGA' BDAG GI MKHAN RIN PO CHE RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS GSER GYI BKA' LUNG GI BDAG DGE SLONG ROD RJE'I MING CAN LA MO BYANG CHUB LCOG TU LHA TSANGS PA'I DRUNG DU, ,LHA 'DI'I RJES GNANG ZHU BA GTOR BA GNANG DUS, ,LHA CHEN TSANGS PA CHEN PO'I RJES GNANG GI RIM PA JI LTAR MDZAD KYI PHYAG LEN BZHIN DU ZHE HOR BKRA SHIS LHUN POR YI GER BRIS PA PO GONG SMOS DGE SLONG RDO RJE'I MING CAN NO,, ,,DGE'O, ,)
